publicationStmt.p: Original of the copybook has been withdrawn. Digitised images are available online and can also be consulted in the Reading Room of the Department of Manuscripts, National Library of Ireland.

objectDesc.p: Copybook in plain blue cover. [24] p. 21.7 x 17.5 cm. On back cover (inner) in MS Λabcd.
